name: CircularSociety AG
goal: CircularSociety AG is a social - for - profit - enterprise that cultivates a new approach to leadership and innovation-ability. We do this through training, consulting and through "Social Impact Projects" - one of them being the "European Youth Employment" project that sets out to train young unemployed individuals in some 15 soft skills that are demanded by employers.
euInitiatives: We are particularly interested in the aspects of education and Youth Employment. This means we would like to get informed about upcoming initiatives in these 2 areas.
